reference.shortdesc: The responsibleParty element identifies the individual or team whose task it is to perform a remedy procedure. It also provides important information, such as the fact that the warranty is voided if the procedure is performed by the wrong person.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Implementation might want to consider having their stylesheets render a label for this element.
